@name = Requests

# @base = https://api.com/v1
# @token = shhh

### Post items
POST https://api.com/v1/items/123
# @Accept = application/json
# @Authorization = Bearer shhh
# @Content-Type = application/json

{
    "hello": "yes",
    "this": [
        "is",
        "some",
        "stuff"
    ],
    "nested": {
        "oh": "yes"
    }
}

<> response.200.json


### Get item
GET https://api.com/v1/items/123
# @Accept = application/json
# @Authorization = Bearer shhh
# @Content-Type = application/json
